summary: User reports that Temporal TypeScript SDK worker cannot connect when running on Bun runtime - the connection hangs and doesn't respond. SDK maintainers clarified that Bun is not officially supported due to differences in N-API error handling between Bun and Node.js.
userImpact: Users attempting to run Temporal workers on Bun runtime will experience application hangs and cannot connect to Temporal servers.
rootCause: Bun's N-API implementation differs from Node.js in how it handles the `error` argument in `napi_throw`, breaking Neon Binding's safety checks for JS environment callbacks.
resolutionDetails: Bun is not officially supported. The issue stems from upstream Bun's N-API implementation differences. Maintainers are waiting for Bun's N-API stabilization before considering support.
keyQuote: We don't support Bun at this time. It is simply too early for that.
